column4: I don't mean to be a dick, but I've been in and out of here all day and barely gotten one person to respond to my yes/no questions. I have a vista machine that is not payed off. I managed to get the live cd that I ordered from ubuntu to boot once, but I forgot to back up my files. I loaded windows, backed up my files and now it won't boot from disk no matter what I do. It won't even read the disk. This means I am forced to bo
I have copied the contents of the feisty cd to a 1gb flash drive. will it boot?
nonlinearno. where can i get that
if you're don't want linux, on the drive, you need to restore the windows MBR - google is your friend
